item.title: Photography
item.description: Sometimes I take pictures. This project is about the pictures I take. Sometimes, they are pictures of cats.

item.title: Hideous Progeny: Tidytext Analysis of Frankenstein
item.description: The Moden Prometheus Capture of Frankenstein (Text) Add Chapter Column Unnest Words Most Common Words And now, once again, I bid my hideous progeny go forth and prosper. ‚Äî Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley (London, 15 October 1831) The Moden Prometheus Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley‚Äôs Frankenstein (The Modern Prometheus) is one of the best stories any can read. If anyone was to start their journey in the wonderful world of stories, Frankenstein will always be my suggestion for first read.

item.title: About
item.description: An amateur…is someone not quite up to par, a person not to be taken seriously, one whose performance falls short of professional standards. But originally, “amateur”, from the Latin verb amare, “to love”, referred to a person who loved what he was doing. — Mihaly Cziksentmihalyi, Flow: The Psychology of Optimal Experience I started learning R in December 2017. I never stopped learning it and using it since then.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Have a question about R, data science, or about me? Want to collaborate for a certain project? Do not hesistate to contact me. I prefer messages and questions via email.
